Title: Il giudice ragazzino
Writer: Alessandro Di Robilant (story), Andrea Purgatori (story), Ugo Pirro (screenplay), Andrea Purgatori (screenplay), Alessandro Di Robilant (screenplay collaboration), Nando Dalla Chiesa (book)
Actors: Giulio Scarpati, Sabrina Ferilli, Leopoldo Trieste, Regina Bianchi
Plot: The true story of Rosario Livatino, a young judge in Sicily in the early 1980s, who have been nicknamed 'The Boy Judge' from the President of the Republic. He's strictly incorruptible, ...
